meanings.definition: The quality of being prepared in advance.
meanings.sent1: Her forehandednesses in packing for the trip saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent2: His forehandednesses in saving money allowed him to buy a new car.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's forehandednesses in storing nuts for winter made the other animals jealous.
meanings.sent4: The captain's forehandednesses in charting the course led the ship safely through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The forehandednesses of the teacher in preparing extra materials for the class impressed the students.

meanings.definition: The act of planning for the future.
meanings.sent1: Planning for retirement shows great forehandednesses.
meanings.sent2: Her forehandednesses in scheduling events ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The alien's forehandednesses in predicting Earth's future amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The forehandednesses of the architect in designing earthquake-resistant buildings saved lives.
meanings.sent5: The forehandednesses of the farmer in planting early resulted in a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: The state of being proactive and organized.
meanings.sent1: His forehandednesses in delegating tasks made the project a success.
meanings.sent2: The forehandednesses of the team leader kept the project on track.
meanings.sent3: The detective's forehandednesses in solving the case quickly impressed the chief.
meanings.sent4: The forehandednesses of the student in preparing for exams paid off with high grades.
meanings.sent5: The forehandednesses of the chef in prepping ingredients ahead of time saved cooking time.
